content: Research study PFD-MYO-24 investigating myofascial release techniques for pelvic floor dysfunction updated inclusion criteria to require baseline pain scores â‰¥6 on VAS scale. Current enrollment stands at 17 participants from Pine Ridge Health System out of 40 target. Study coordinator reports challenges recruiting male patients (current ratio 1:16). Preliminary data shows 28% reduction in pain scores among completers at 8-week mark.
